name: EduTECH Philippines
content: At EduTECH Philippines, weâ€™ll be gathering 1,000 leading educators and government officials from around the country as well as some of the best innovators from around the world on 21-22 February 2017 at SMX Convention Centre, Manila. Featuring over 60 inspirational speakers, all brimming with ideas and a passion to inspire change in education, the event will map out and drive forward next generation education in the Philippines. Running alongside is a dedicated exhibition, showcasing the latest education technology solutions and free content for teachers from teachers.
